aboutus.Cp_14: Ronix has been present in the global markets since 2005 by registering its offices in Europe (Germany) and China. Ever since, we have been offering and delivering high-quality products to our customers. Our products are tailored for the specific needs of experts. Driven by a passion to satisfy the needs of professionals around the world, Ronix has, and will always try to go beyond the global standards and provide outstanding quality and services.
aboutus.Cp_16: Ronix has always had a different approach towards the global markets. By utilizing our expert, multi-language, international sales team to establish ourselves among distributors and wholesalers in various countries around the globe, we are putting efforts into expanding our reach in the world, both in sales and in aftersales services.
aboutus.Cp_18: Since the beginning, the heart of our activities at Ronix has been based on our five core values. Every one of these values is essential and shapes the nature of our business. They are the foundations of our success and the pillars by which we stand.
aboutus.Cp_2: Ronix is an international brand, active in the tools industry and its related equipment. With the help of our vast experience, extended background, and constant innovations, we produce a variety of high-quality products, all according to the global state-of-the-art technology, through 500 suppliers in 15 countries worldwide.
aboutus.Cp_20: Having diversity in our products to meet the various needs of our customers.
aboutus.Cp_21: From the very beginning, we realized that we would be able to serve our customers far better if we could offer a huge variety of products across many different categories.
aboutus.Cp_23: Maintaining our high quality to establish the reliability of our products and gain our consumers’ trust
aboutus.Cp_24: When Ronix was first founded, it was founded on trust. We have understood that our products’ quality plays a significant role in building trust in our customers and keeping them satisfied with the outcome of their work.
aboutus.Cp_26: Offering reasonable prices for a wide range of tools and products with high quality
aboutus.Cp_27: Ronix is all about giving the pleasure of experiencing quality to every professional there is in the industry.
aboutus.Cp_28: We want consumers to experience the benchmark quality that is Ronix.
aboutus.Cp_3: By relying on its creative human resources, the Ronix brand has always had an eye on the future. Over 300 experts are now working with us in our offices in Europe (Germany), the Middle East (Tehran), and China.
aboutus.Cp_30: Delivering appropriate after sale services to fulfill our commitments regarding customer satisfaction principle
aboutus.Cp_31: Our customers need to know that they are not alone and that quality always come with support.
aboutus.Cp_32: Thanks to our integrated network of after sales services centers, Ronix will be with consumers every step of the way.
aboutus.Cp_34: Maintaining professional organizational behavior for both customers and staff who shape our daily activities and drive our passion to move forward
aboutus.Cp_35: An organization cannot survive without treating its customers and staff with respect. The very existence of Ronix has been based upon respecting its human resources and consumers who have bought Ronix products.
aboutus.Cp_5: Since 2005, Ronix has become a leading tools company in the Middle East and an international brand, specializing in manufacturing a wide variety of professional tools. Currently, the company has offices in Europe (Germany) and China. Over the past 15 years, Ronix has developed more than 2,000 different types of tools, all lovingly crafted with Ronix’s undisputed and world-class standards.
aboutus.Cp_50: By relying on its technical know-how and expertise in offering after sales services for tools, Ronix has established numerous after sales services centers and is ready to provide spare parts and transfer its technological knowledge internationally. Ronix also has the biggest spare parts bank for more than 24000 types of spare parts.
aboutus.Cp_51: While in itself, the current number of after sales services centers in the region is an ample achievement, we continue to provide our technical know-how and extend our support globally to those who are interested in launching such centers and utilizing our technical expertise to offer better services to our customers worldwide.
aboutus.Cp_53: At Ronix, we have successfully entered and currently distribute our high-quality tools throughout over 30 countries worldwide.
aboutus.Cp_54: Our multi-language international sales team is professional and friendly, handling orders and inquiries from our customers around the world quickly and efficiently, and with minimum disruptions.
aboutus.Cp_55: Highly knowledgeable about all tools, they are ready and waiting to discuss your needs with you, providing the best deals and price plans to suit your and your customers’ budget.
aboutus.Cp_6: Today, we at Ronix owe our on-going success to our core values; developed by growing in the heart of the tool industry for years. These values include producing a wide variety of cost-effective, durable, and high-quality tools wrapped in unique and stylish packaging that impress customers and end-users.
aboutus.Cp_7: We are investing, and will continue to invest resources in advanced R&D, high-end technologies, and professional human resources to develop a high variety more efficient tools that meet expert’s needs.
aboutus.Cp_8: Our significant ventures into research and development have given us the technological edge to design, produce, and tailor cost-effective products that are beneficial to every consumer category, from ordinary household handymen to professionals in various industries.
aboutus.Cp_9: We also place great importance on human health and safety. Through our endeavors, we know that a professional person will always enter a Ronix-equipped workshop assured, happy, and safe

contact.FillInTheFromAndWellContactYouSoon: Fill In The From And Well Contact You Soon
contact.IfYouWant: If you want to get more information about ronix or our products, do not hesitate to send us a message. we try to answer all inquiries as soon as possible.
contact.LetUsKnowIfYouHaveAnyInquiries: Let Us Know If You Have Any Inquiries
contact.Name: Name
contact.Room: Room 2403 Building A. Wanda Square Zhangjiagang City, jiangsu, China
contact.WeAreEagerToHaveATalkWithOurCustomersGiv: We Are Eager To Have A Talk With Our Customers Give Us A Call Or Drop By Our Offices Any Time

desk.BenefitingFromProfessional: Ronix has always had a different look at the global marketplace. Using our experienced, multilingual international after-sales team, we continue to provide our technical expertise and expand our worldwide support to those interested in starting centers as distributors or wholesalers of Ronix products.
desk.CheckOutOurLatestProductsInTheRonixCatal: Check Out Our Latest Products In The Ronix Catalogue
desk.ConstantImprovement: Constant improvement is one of the values that Ronix stands for and we believe that there is always room for better tools. Ronix is continuously looking for new solutions to provide a better experience of its users.\nExplore our latest products
desk.Name: Name
desk.RonixAnnuallyTakesPart: Ronix annually takes part in various events, exhibitions and seminars in the field of the tool industry and related equipment around the world. Our main goal is to make it clear to our customers and others that Ronix has the vision and ambition to lead the market.\nHere you can find out more about our international presence at events and exhibitions here.
desk.RonixHasAlwaysHad: Ronix has always had a different look at the global marketplace. Using our expert multilingual international after-sales team, we continue to provide our technical expertise and global support to those interested in starting centers as distributors or wholesalers of Ronix products.
desk.RonixHasBeenPresent: Ronix has been present on the world markets since 2011, having registered its offices in Europe (Germany) and China. Since then, we have been offering and supplying high quality tools to our customers. Ronix products are based on striving to meet the needs of professionals around the world. For more information about Ronix and our products, contact us now.
desk.RonixIsAnInternationalBrand: Ronix is an international brand active in the instrument industry. With our vast experience, advanced background, innovation, we manufacture a variety of high quality products beyond world standards.
desk.RonixIsKnownAs: Ronix is known as an international brand in the instrument industry. With help from our suppliers in 15 countries and 300 experts in our offices in Germany, Tehran and China, we are working to expand our presence worldwide. Our five core values are at the heart of our business: variety, quality, reasonable prices, after-sales service and professional conduct.
desk.RonixToolsCompanyText: Lorem ipsum is placeholder text commonly used in the graphic, print, and publishing industries\n                        for previewing layouts and visual mockups.
desk.Since2005: Since 2005, Ronix has become a leading company in the Middle East and has been introduced to global markets. Over the past 15 years, Ronix has become a successful brand specializing in the production of a wide range of professional tools of various types and models. Considering the satisfaction and needs of each individual, we have always tried to go beyond global standards, quality and services.
desk.ToFullySupportTheNeeds: To fully meet the needs of Ronix users, we want to ensure that our retailers and after-sales service centers are fully stocked with all the required replacement parts. We manufacture over 90000 spare parts for our products and we can distribute these spare parts to our retailers all over the world.
desk.ToReceiveMoreInformation: For more information on the latest Ronix products and innovations, download our detailed catalog.\nYou can download the Ronix catalog here.
desk.WeAtRonixAreCommitted: We at Ronix are committed to helping you grow your sales. We are ready to help you raise awareness of Ronix products by developing new content for your website, blog, social media accounts, etc. We can also provide you with any promotional material you may need, such as posters and business cards. cards.
desk.WeAtRonixAreContinuously: At Ronix we are constantly trying to provide new and better solutions to meet the needs of professionals around the world. Relying on our state of the art technology and world class standards, we strive to continually offer more powerful and practical tools.\nCheck out the latest Ronix products here.
